titleStmt.title: A supplement to The queen-like closet, or, A little of everything presented to all ingenious ladies, and gentlewomen / by Hannah Woolley ...
titleStmt.author: Woolley, Hannah, fl. 1670.
Woolley, Hannah, fl. 1670. Queen-like closet.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.R. for Richard Lownds, and are to be Sold at the Sign of the White Lion ...,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: tightly bound and stained, with print show-through and some loss of print; p. 21-22, 55-56, 65-66 lacking.
Reproduction of original in: British Library.
